altername_name: Ryu ga Gotoku 1&2 HD for Wii U
name: Ryū ga Gotoku 1&2 HD for Wii U
overview: This is a collection featuring HD remasters of the first two games in the Ryū ga Gotoku (Yakuza in the west) franchise. It is a port of the PlayStation 3 remasters released a year earlier. As with the PS3 version this collection was released exclusively in Japan.
